label: 勧農使
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: A title granted to Minamoto Yoritomo's special deputy in the Hokuriku region after 1184. The holder of this office was Hiki Tōnai Tomomune, and his authority included overseeing vassals and restoring cultivation in public lands."　[源頼朝、比企藤内朝宗]　"
